verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: informed] [ARG1: France 's Emmanuel Macron] [ARGM-LOC: in a phone call] [ARGM-TMP: this morning] [ARG2: that he will pull the U.S. out the nuclear deal it signed onto three years ago after intense negotiations with Tehran] .
